description: Wind direction hindcast data for two Dutch (future) offshore wind farms (Ten Noorden van de Wadden and Hollandse Kust West) from the TKI Coupled High-resolution Atmosphere-Sea Modelling (CHASM) project (Whiffle and Deltares). This dataset includes 9 year of high-resolution (spatial and temporal) field and point data. See [this link](https://projecten.topsectorenergie.nl/projecten/coupled-high-resolution-atmosphere-sea-modelling-00029218) for more information. For instructions on how to obtain the data, see the [Deltares Data Portal](https://deltaresdata.openearth.eu/geonetwork/srv/eng/catalog.search#/metadata/0bca9f82-00e0-4346-b164-fdc0aa043605).
title: Wind Direction CHASM
license_use: CHASM Data Products (Wave height CHASM, Wave direction CHASM and Wave period CHASM, Wind speed CHASM and Wind direction CHASM and Turbulence CHASM). - The CHASM Data Products are provided as a deliverable of a project aimed at innovations in numerical metocean modelling. Care has been taken to incorporate the latest scientific insights and to validate the methods against measured metocean data. However, a more elaborate validation is recommended before using the data for operational and/or planning purposes.
license_warranty: CHASM Data Product: Deltares and/or Whiffle does not guarantee, or imply in any way, that the CHASM Data Products will correspond to actual metocean conditions at the time of Userâ€™s intended activities.

providers.name: Deltares
providers.description: Deltares is an independent institute for applied research in the field of water and subsurface.
